trans-unit.source: Apothecary Initiate
trans-unit.target: 药剂学徒

trans-unit.resname: SHM·1 | Apothecary Initiate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手使用白色咒语时，你可以支付{1}。 若你如此作，则你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Kithkin jealously hoard their knowledge of poultices and remedies so that no outside threat can benefit from their wisdom.
trans-unit.target: 洁英谨慎地让该族的草药与治疗知识不外流，让外界威胁没办法从他们的智慧中获益。

trans-unit.source: Armored Ascension
trans-unit.target: 武装飞腾

trans-unit.resname: SHM·2 | Armored Ascension | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Plains you control and has flying.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 你每操控一个平原，受此结界的生物便得+1/+1且具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: "Why enchant feathers to make them sturdy when we can enchant shields to make them fly?"\n—Braenna, cobblesmith
trans-unit.target: 「既然我们能缄咒让盾牌飞起来，又何必要缄咒让羽毛变得坚固？」 ～工匠布列娜

trans-unit.source: Ballynock Cohort
trans-unit.target: 巴立纳助拳人

trans-unit.resname: SHM·3 | Ballynock Cohort | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nCARDNAME gets +1/+1 as long as you control another white creature.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 只要你操控其他白色生物，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: A kithkin's worst enemy is solitude.
trans-unit.target: 洁英最难应付的敌人就是孤立。

trans-unit.source: Barrenton Medic
trans-unit.target: 八连屯医护员

trans-unit.resname: SHM·4 | Barrenton Medic | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.\nPut a -1/-1 counter on CARDNAME: Untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {T}：于本回合中，防止接下来将对目标生物或牌手造成的1点伤害。 在CARDNAME上放置一个-1/-1指示物：重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: His dreams are filled with noxious powders and clinking vials.
trans-unit.target: 他的梦境充满了毒粉与当啷作响的药瓶。

trans-unit.source: Boon Reflection
trans-unit.target: 恩泽映象

trans-unit.resname: SHM·5 | Boon Reflection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.
trans-unit.target: 若你将获得生命，则改为你获得该数量两倍的生命。

trans-unit.source: Kithkin healers chant the clan songs of both their parents over the broth to double its curative effect.
trans-unit.target: 洁英医者煮药汤时，会吟诵父母双方的部族歌谣，好让医疗效果加倍。

trans-unit.source: Goldenglow Moth
trans-unit.target: 澄闪蛾

trans-unit.resname: SHM·6 | Goldenglow Moth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME blocks, you may gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME阻挡时，你可以获得4点生命

trans-unit.source: Ordinary moths follow it, drawn to its light.
trans-unit.target: 一般的蛾会受其光芒所吸引而随之飞翔。

trans-unit.source: Greater Auramancy
trans-unit.target: 高等灵气术

trans-unit.resname: SHM·7 | Greater Auramancy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other enchantments you control have shroud.\nEnchanted creatures you control have shroud.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他结界具有帷幕异能。 由你操控、且被结附的生物具有帷幕异能。

trans-unit.source: A delicate veil of glamers can prove as sturdy as iron.
trans-unit.target: 精巧的幻法屏幔也可以坚硬如钢。

trans-unit.source: Inquisitor's Snare
trans-unit.target: 审判官罗网

trans-unit.resname: SHM·8 | Inquisitor's Snare | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage target attacking or blocking creature would deal this turn. If that creature is black or red, destroy it.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，防止目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物将造成的所有伤害。 若该生物是红色或黑色，则将它消灭。

trans-unit.source: Driven by their paranoia, kithkin inflict on their foes all the agonies they believe would have been inflicted on them.
trans-unit.target: 由于洁英的妄想，他们会把自己所认定被敌人所引致的苦痛悉数回敬。

trans-unit.source: Kithkin Rabble
trans-unit.target: 洁英齐众

trans-unit.resname: SHM·9 | Kithkin Rabble | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nCARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of white permanents you control.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 CARDNAME的力量与防御力各等同于由你操控的白色永久物之数量。

trans-unit.source: If even the slightest hint of panic enters the thoughtweft, bakers, potters, and even medics drop their spoons and salves to take up arms.
trans-unit.target: 就算是最细微的惊慌进入纺思之间，所有面包师父、陶匠，甚至治疗师都会丢下汤匙与药膏、拿起武器来。

trans-unit.source: Kithkin Shielddare
trans-unit.target: 洁英持盾客

trans-unit.resname: SHM·10 | Kithkin Shielddare | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Target blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：目标进行阻挡的生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The nova glyph is a potent symbol. A shield embossed with it can resist the force of even the most determined giant.
trans-unit.target: 上面的新星雕饰是强大符号。 有这符号的盾牌甚至能够挡下巨人的奋力一击。

trans-unit.source: Last Breath
trans-unit.target: 咽气

trans-unit.resname: SHM·11 | Last Breath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove target creature with power 2 or less from the game. Its controller gains 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 将目标力量等于或小于2的生物移出对战。 其操控者获得4点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Tsk. You'd think those nasty merrows would know how to hold their breath."\n—Olka, mistmeadow witch
trans-unit.target: 「啐。 还以为这些鬼祟的美洛有办法屏息多久呢。」 ～雾牧地法术师欧卡

trans-unit.source: Mass Calcify
trans-unit.target: 全面钙化

trans-unit.resname: SHM·12 | Mass Calcify | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all nonwhite creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有非白色的生物。

trans-unit.source: The dead serve as their own tombstones.
trans-unit.target: 亡者正好能当成自己的墓碑。

trans-unit.source: Mine Excavation
trans-unit.target: 开挖宝库

trans-unit.resname: SHM·13 | Mine Excavation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target artifact or enchantment card in a graveyard to its owner's hand.\nConspire (As you play this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器或结界牌从坟墓场移回其拥有者手上。 协力 （于你使用此咒语时，你可以横置两个由你操控、且与此咒语有共通颜色的未横置生物。 当你如此作，则复制此咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.source: Mistmeadow Skulk
trans-unit.target: 雾牧地潜伏客

trans-unit.resname: SHM·14 | Mistmeadow Skulk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lifelink, protection from converted mana cost 3 or greater
trans-unit.target: 系命，保护（总法术力大于或等于3）

trans-unit.source: Doyo suspected the boggarts of brewing a plot against his crop, so he scythed away his grain to clear the sightlines.
trans-unit.target: 多佑怀疑波尬正打他的谷物主意，于是把谷子全刈平好让视野畅通。

trans-unit.source: Niveous Wisps
trans-unit.target: 雪白鬼火

trans-unit.resname: SHM·15 | Niveous Wisps | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature becomes white until end of turn. Tap that creature.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物成为白色直到回合结束。 横置该生物。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: In a world devoid of sun, illumination comes from cheerless fires or the wandering spirits of the dead.
trans-unit.target: 在暗无天日的世界中，启发之光是来自无精打采的火焰，或是游荡的亡者灵魂。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·16 | Order of Whiteclay | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Order of Whiteclay
trans-unit.target: 白土教士團

trans-unit.resname: SHM·16 | Order of Whiteclay | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}{W}, {Q}: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to play. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
trans-unit.target: {1}{W}{W}，{Q}：将目标总法术力费用等于或小于3的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回场上。 （{Q}是重置符号。）

trans-unit.resname: SHM·16 | Order of Whiteclay | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Made from the clay of burial mounds, the face paint of the priests is a sign of their respect for those whose rest they interrupt.
trans-unit.target: 教士脸上粉彩取自墓冢白土，以对受其惊扰的逝者表示尊重。

trans-unit.source: Pale Wayfarer
trans-unit.target: 苍白旅人

trans-unit.resname: SHM·17 | Pale Wayfarer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{W}{W}, {Q}: Target creature gains protection from the color of its controller's choice until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
trans-unit.target: {2}{W}{W}，{Q}：目标生物的操控者选择一种颜色，它获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。 （{Q}是重置符号。）

trans-unit.source: As it wandered Shadowmoor, it did not remember its crime—only its shame.
trans-unit.target: 它在暗影荒原四处游荡，不记得自己犯下的罪过～只记得其耻辱。

trans-unit.source: Prison Term
trans-unit.target: 刑期

trans-unit.resname: SHM·18 | Prison Term | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be played.\nWhenever a creature comes into play under an opponent's control, you may attach CARDNAME to that creature.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 受此结界的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能使用。 每当一个生物在对手的操控下进场时，你可以将CARDNAME结附在该生物上。

trans-unit.source: Clear out the cell. Bring in the next prisoner.
trans-unit.target: 把牢房清空。 带下一个囚人进来。

trans-unit.source: Resplendent Mentor
trans-unit.target: 华辉明师

trans-unit.resname: SHM·19 | Resplendent Mentor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: White creatures you control have "{T}: You gain 1 life."
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的白色生物具有「{T}：你获得1点生命。」

trans-unit.source: Thoughtweft gives new meaning to the phrase "common knowledge."
trans-unit.target: 纺思让「常识」一词有了新意义。

trans-unit.source: Rune-Cervin Rider
trans-unit.target: 符驹骑兵

trans-unit.resname: SHM·20 | Rune-Cervin Rider | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{RW}{RW}: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {G/W}{G/W}：CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Things of beauty are in constant peril. The riders whisk them to safety, ahead of the encroaching darkness.
trans-unit.target: 美丽事物时时面临危机。 在黑暗入侵之前，骑兵会迅速将之移入安境。

trans-unit.source: Runed Halo
trans-unit.target: 符文光晕

trans-unit.resname: SHM·21 | Runed Halo | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, name a card.\nYou have protection from the chosen name. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything with that name.)
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进场时，说出一个牌名。 你具有反该名称保护异能。 （你不能被该名称的东西指定为目标，造成伤害，或是被结附）

trans-unit.source: Safehold Sentry
trans-unit.target: 华域哨兵

trans-unit.resname: SHM·22 | Safehold Sentry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{W}, {Q}: CARDNAME gets +0/+2 until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
trans-unit.target: {2}{W}，{Q}：CARDNAME得+0/+2直到回合结束。 （{Q}是重置符号。）

trans-unit.source: "These bracers were worn by my father and by his mother before him. Boggart fangs have shattered on them. Cinder flames have withered at their touch. While I wear them, the safehold will not fall."
trans-unit.target: 「我父亲与祖母都戴过这腕甲。 它打碎过波尬牙齿， 熄灭过烬身火焰。 只要我带着它，华域必不会陷落。」

trans-unit.source: Spectral Procession
trans-unit.target: 幽灵行列

trans-unit.resname: SHM·23 | Spectral Procession | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({2\nW} can be paid with any two mana or with {W}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)\nPut three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying into play.
trans-unit.target: （能用任意两点法术力或是{W}来支付{2/W}。 此牌的总法术力费用为6。） 将三个1/1白色，具有飞行异能的精怪衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: "The dead have it easy. They suffer no more. If breaking their rest helps the living, so be it."\n—Olka, mistmeadow witch
trans-unit.target: 「死人可以轻松胜任； 它们再也不会感到伤痛。 如果打扰它们的安眠能帮助活人，那就作吧。」 ～雾牧地法术师欧卡

trans-unit.source: Strip Bare

trans-unit.source: Destroy all Auras and Equipment attached to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有结附或装备在目标生物上的灵气与武具。

trans-unit.source: "All glamers lifted, all lies revealed, all flesh exposed."\n—Awylla, elvish safewright
trans-unit.target: 「幻法消散，谎言现形，原身显露。」 ～地精美境卫艾薇拉

trans-unit.source: Twilight Shepherd
trans-unit.target: 微光牧者

trans-unit.resname: SHM·25 | Twilight Shepherd | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, return to your hand all cards in your graveyard put there from play this turn.\nPersist (When this creature is put into a graveyard from play, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to play under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒 当CARDNAME进场时，将你坟墓场中于本回合从场上进入该处的所有牌移回你的手上。 留存 （当此生物从场上置入坟墓场时，若其上没有-1/-1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回场上，且其上有一个-1/-1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Windbrisk Raptor
trans-unit.target: 迅风猎鸟

trans-unit.source: Flying\nAttacking creatures you control have lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 由你操控、且进行攻击的生物具有系命异能。

trans-unit.source: It awakened to gloom-fouled skies and responded with a righteous rage that shook the heavens.
trans-unit.target: 他面临这昏暗无光的天际，以正义之怒震撼长空。

trans-unit.source: Woeleecher
trans-unit.target: 消灾蛭灵

trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from target creature. If you do, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：从目标生物上移去一个-1/-1指示物。 若你如此作，则你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: One head senses the curse. The second loosens it from the soul. The third drinks it as an invigorating mist.
trans-unit.target: 第一个头感受到诅咒。 第二个头将它自心灵松脱。 第三个头将它一饮而尽，宛如提神之雾。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·28 | Advice from the Fae | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Advice from the Fae
trans-unit.target: 仙儿建言

trans-unit.resname: SHM·28 | Advice from the Fae | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({2\nU} can be paid with any two mana or with {U}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)\nLook at the top five cards of your library. If you control more creatures than any other player, put two of those cards into your hand. Otherwise, put one of them into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: （能用任意两点法术力或是{U}来支付{2/U}。 此牌的总法术力费用为6。） 检视你牌库顶的五张牌。 如果由你操控的生物数量比其他每位牌手都多，则将其中两张置于你手上。 若否，则将其中一张置于你手上。 然后将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.target: 刺痛栓链

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nYou control enchanted creature.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 你操控受此结界的生物。 在你的维持开始时，在受此结界的生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: A chain of lies as strong as steel.
trans-unit.target: 谎言锁链坚硬如钢。

trans-unit.target: 荆莓助拳人

trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME gets +1/+1 as long as you control another blue creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 只要你操控其他蓝色生物，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: A clique can cause far more mischief than one faerie on its own.
trans-unit.target: 比起一个仙灵，一个聚群能搞出更大规模的恶戏。

trans-unit.source: Cerulean Wisps
trans-unit.target: 蔚蓝鬼火

trans-unit.source: Target creature becomes blue until end of turn. Untap that creature.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物成为蓝色直到回合结束。 重置该生物。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "If you see ghostly lights by the river, eat three twigs of marshroot to ward off kelpies."\n—Kithkin superstition
trans-unit.target: 「如果在河畔看到鬼魅火光，吃下三条葵根就可以让凯尔比不上身。」 ～洁英的迷信

trans-unit.resname: SHM·32 | Consign to Dream | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. If that permanent is red or green, put it on top of its owner's library instead.
trans-unit.target: 将目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。 若该永久物为红色或绿色，则改为将它置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·32 | Consign to Dream | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Dreams are fleeting. Reality even more so."\n—Oona, queen of the fae
trans-unit.target: 「梦想不断飞逝； 现实消失得更快。」 ～仙儿女王欧娜

trans-unit.source: Counterbore
trans-unit.target: 反击锥孔

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that spell and remove them from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。 自其操控者的坟墓场、手牌、以及牌库中搜寻与该咒语同名的牌，并将这些牌移出对战。 然后该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Cursecatcher
trans-unit.target: 捕咒师

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：除非目标瞬间或法术咒语的操控者支付{1}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.source: "Of all the things that can be stolen, opportunity is the most valuable."
trans-unit.target: 「在会给偷走的东西里面，最宝贵的就是机会。」

trans-unit.source: Deepchannel Mentor
trans-unit.target: 通渠明师

trans-unit.resname: SHM·35 | Deepchannel Mentor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Blue creatures you control are unblockable.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的蓝色生物不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: The rivers can no longer provide safe passage for travelers and commerce. They serve only as highways for raiders and channels for blood and woe.
trans-unit.target: 河流再也无法替旅人与贸易提供安全路途。 它们只是盗匪的大道、血光之捷径。

trans-unit.source: Drowner Initiate
trans-unit.target: 沉密学徒

trans-unit.resname: SHM·36 | Drowner Initiate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手使用蓝色咒语时，你可以支付{1}。 若你如此作，则目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Nothing satisfies a merrow as much as drowning what it cannot have.
trans-unit.target: 美洛最大的乐趣，莫过于将自己不能拥有的东西沉到水底。

trans-unit.source: Faerie Swarm
trans-unit.target: 仙灵大群

trans-unit.resname: SHM·37 | Faerie Swarm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of blue permanents you control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME的力量与防御力各等同于由你操控的蓝色永久物之数量。

trans-unit.source: Untouched by the Aurora, Oona's faeries greeted the night like any other day.
trans-unit.target: 欧娜的仙灵丝毫不受极光影响，每天如常地迎接夜色降临。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·38 | Flow of Ideas | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 源源灵感

trans-unit.resname: SHM·38 | Flow of Ideas | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card for each Island you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个海岛，就抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·38 | Flow of Ideas | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Beware the merrows, whose envy and covetousness surpasses even that of the ravenous whirlpools where they dwell."\n—*The Book of Other Folk*
trans-unit.target: 「要特别提防美洛，他们忌妒又贪婪，比所居住的无餍漩涡更危险。」 ～《他族通论》

trans-unit.source: Ghastly Discovery
trans-unit.target: 恐怖发现

trans-unit.resname: SHM·39 | Ghastly Discovery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards, then discard a card.\nConspire (As you play this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，然后弃一张牌。 协力 （于你使用此咒语时，你可以横置两个由你操控、且与此咒语有共通颜色的未横置生物。 当你如此作，则复制此咒语。）

trans-unit.source: Korrigans, spirits bound to sources of water, shriek when they come upon their own drowned corpses.
trans-unit.target: 夜水妖是被水体所束缚的灵魂，碰上自己溺死的尸体时会惊恐尖叫。

trans-unit.target: 岛背后裔

trans-unit.target: 帷幕 只要任一牌库为二十张牌或更少，CARDNAME便得+4/+8。

trans-unit.source: The more deadly the lake monster, the shorter the tale.
trans-unit.target: 湖中怪物越恐怖，其传说就越短。

trans-unit.source: Kinscaer Harpoonist
trans-unit.target: 英刹园鱼叉手

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may have target creature lose flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以让目标生物失去飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The suspicious kithkin of Kinscaer patrol the skies, their eyes attuned to the shapes of outsiders.
trans-unit.target: 英刹园多疑的洁英在空中巡逻，双眼留意着外来者踪影。

trans-unit.source: Knacksaw Clique
trans-unit.target: 巧锯聚群

trans-unit.target: 飞行 {1}{U}，{Q}：目标对手将其牌库顶牌移出对战。 直到回合结束，你可以使用该牌。 （{Q}是重置符号。）

trans-unit.source: Most of the Knacksaw clique's skills were hewn from the minds of others.
trans-unit.target: 巧锯聚群所会的大部分技巧都是自他人心灵窃取而来。

trans-unit.source: Leech Bonder

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进场时上面有两个-1/-1指示物。 {U}，{Q}：将一个指示物从目标生物移到另一个目标生物上。 （{Q}是重置符号。）

trans-unit.source: Some don't know his face, but his pets are a dead giveaway.
trans-unit.target: 有些人没见过他的长相，但他的宠物是个很好的线索。

trans-unit.source: Merrow Wavebreakers
trans-unit.target: 破浪美洛

trans-unit.resname: SHM·44 | Merrow Wavebreakers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}, {Q}: CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，{Q}：CARDNAME获得飞行异能直到回合结束。 （{Q}是重置符号。）

trans-unit.source: The merrows' prey have retreated from the shore, so they have learned to follow.
trans-unit.target: 美洛的猎物已自海岸撤退，他们因此学会如何跟进。

trans-unit.source: Parapet Watchers
trans-unit.target: 胸墙看守

trans-unit.source: {WU}: CARDNAME gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {W/U}：CARDNAME得+0/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: A kithkin doun is not so much a town as a fortress, built to withstand the constantly besieging darkness. Only those most watchful and trustworthy are tasked with guarding its walls.
trans-unit.target: 为了对抗黑暗势力不时的侵扰，洁英小镇都建造得有如要塞一般。 只有眼光最利又最可靠的才能担当守墙重任。

trans-unit.source: Prismwake Merrow
trans-unit.target: 彩迹美洛

trans-unit.source: "Seeing is believing" is a fact the merrows ruthlessly exploit in their dealings with the other residents of Shadowmoor.
trans-unit.target: 美洛与暗影荒原其他居民交易时奉行不渝的准则，便是「眼见为凭」。

trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。 你可以将至多一张目标牌从你坟墓场洗入你的牌库。

trans-unit.source: Kithkin spellbottlers spend half their time preserving old memories and the other half punishing the new.
trans-unit.target: 洁英瓶咒师花上一半时间来保存旧记忆，另一半则拿来惩罚新记忆。

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another permanent is put into play from a graveyard, draw a card.\nWhenever a spell is played from a graveyard, draw a card.\nPersist (When this creature is put into a graveyard from play, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to play under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个永久物从场上置入坟墓场时，抓一张牌。 每当有咒语从坟墓场使用时，抓一张牌。 留存 （当此生物从场上置入坟墓场时，若其上没有-1/-1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回场上，且其上有一个-1/-1指示物。）

trans-unit.target: 「想法？ 诡计？ 进展？ 这下你只让它更饿了。」 ～洁英炼金术士艾帛

trans-unit.target: 「没人会给我们让出个容身之处。 如果我们待不了，他们也别想留下。 直到他们给自己冷却的灰烬覆盖，我们绝不罢手。」 ～夜炉的伊璐里

trans-unit.source: There are things beneath the murk for whom the bog is a stew, a thin broth in need of meat.
trans-unit.target: 对藏身泥泞下之物来说，沼泽是锅无味淡汤，得加点肉才行。

trans-unit.source: Fear\nCARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of black permanents you control.
trans-unit.target: 恐惧 CARDNAME的力量及防御力各等同于由你操控的黑色永久物之数量。

trans-unit.source: They envy the life-giving heat so much that they tear it from those who still possess it.
trans-unit.target: 他们极为忌妒能给予生命的热力，甚至要从仍持有热力者之处抢过来。

trans-unit.source: Return target creature card in a graveyard to its owner's hand.\nConspire (As you play this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从坟墓场移回其拥有者手上。 协力 （于你使用此咒语时，你可以横置两个由你操控、且与此咒语有共通颜色的未横置生物。 当你如此作，则复制此咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.source: They spawn from shadow, wreaking chaos until shadow claims them again.
trans-unit.target: 他们诞生自黯影，不断制造浑沌，终而重归黯影。

trans-unit.source: Faerie Macabre
trans-unit.target: 渡亡仙灵

trans-unit.target: 飞行 弃掉CARDNAME：将至多两张目标牌从任何坟墓场中移出对战。

trans-unit.target: 幻梦与死亡之间的界线既薄又脆弱。 她将太接近者从此处拉到彼处。

trans-unit.target: 阴暗矛刺

trans-unit.source: Death stings the victim only once, but those left behind feel the pain of loss with every passing memory.
trans-unit.target: 死亡只让遭难者痛苦一次，而每个逝去的记忆却让幸存者不断感受失落之苦痛。

trans-unit.source: Hollowborn Barghest
trans-unit.target: 洼生犬魔

trans-unit.source: It leaves a trail of crumpled trees and dashed dreams.

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME成为未横置时，你可以令目标牌手弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Dreams of dark nights to come are said to stir in the minds of scheming hollowsages.
trans-unit.target: 将临的黑暗夜晚，据说总让满腹阴谋的寂空贤者振奋不已。

trans-unit.source: Shadowmoor's main crops are rot, slime, and despair.

trans-unit.source: "Don't look upon still waters without first breaking the surface. The korrigan will catch you with her gaze and drag you to your death."\n—Kithkin superstition
trans-unit.target: 「在看着静水之前，一定要先将水面弄皱。 否则夜水妖会用眼神定住你，把你拖下水溺死。」 ～洁英的迷信

trans-unit.source: Midnight Banshee
trans-unit.target: 午夜女妖

trans-unit.resname: SHM·72 | Midnight Banshee | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on each nonblack creature.
trans-unit.target: 干枯 （此来源会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。） 在你的维持开始时，在每个非黑色生物上各放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Many have heard the beginning of its low, sustained shriek but few the end.
trans-unit.target: 许多人听过它低沉、绵长尖叫的开头，但很少有人听到结尾。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·73 | Plague of Vermin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plague of Vermin
trans-unit.target: 病媒疫疾

trans-unit.resname: SHM·73 | Plague of Vermin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of life. Repeat this process until no one pays life. Each player puts a 1/1 black Rat creature token into play for each 1 life he or she paid this way.
trans-unit.target: 由你开始，每位牌手可以支付任意数量的生命值。 重复此流程，直到没有人支付生命为止。 对每位牌手而言，他每以此法支付1点生命，就将一个1/1黑色老鼠衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Polluted Bonds
trans-unit.target: 污物羁绊

trans-unit.resname: SHM·74 | Polluted Bonds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a land comes into play under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个地在对手的操控下进场时，该牌手失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: The mystic bond between spellcasters and the land is just as vulnerable to attack as the casters themselves.
trans-unit.target: 施术者与大地之间的神秘连结，就如术者本身同样脆弱而不堪一击。

trans-unit.source: Puppeteer Clique
trans-unit.target: 操偶聚群

trans-unit.resname: SHM·75 | Puppeteer Clique | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, put target creature card in an opponent's graveyard into play under your control. It has haste. At the end of your turn, remove it from the game.\nPersist (When this creature is put into a graveyard from play, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to play under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，将目标生物牌在你的操控下从对手的坟墓场放置进场。 它具有敏捷。 在你的回合结束时，将它移出对战。 留存 （当此生物从场上置入坟墓场时，若其上没有-1/-1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回场上，且其上有一个-1/-1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: SHM·76 | Rite of Consumption | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rite of Consumption
trans-unit.target: 耗竭仪式

trans-unit.resname: SHM·76 | Rite of Consumption | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to play CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.\nCARDNAME deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为使用CARDNAME的额外费用。 CARDNAME对目标牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于所牺牲生物的力量。 你获得等同于以此法所造成的伤害之生命。

trans-unit.source: Sickle Ripper
trans-unit.target: 镰刀夺魂妖

trans-unit.resname: SHM·77 | Sickle Ripper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
trans-unit.target: 干枯 （此来源会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: His sickle was forged in the heat of another cinder's funeral pyre.
trans-unit.target: 其镰刀系以其他烬身的葬火所加温打造。

trans-unit.source: Smolder Initiate
trans-unit.target: 窒烟学徒

trans-unit.resname: SHM·78 | Smolder Initiate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手使用黑色咒语时，你可以支付{1}。 如果你如此作，则目标牌手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Life is a circle. Death is a vicious circle."
trans-unit.target: 「生命是个循环。 死亡则是恶毒的循环。」

trans-unit.source: Splitting Headache
trans-unit.target: 头痛欲裂

trans-unit.resname: SHM·79 | Splitting Headache | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one Target player discards two cards; or target player reveals his or her hand, you choose a card from it, then that player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～目标牌手弃两张牌；或目标牌手展示其手牌，你选择其中一张，然后该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: All faeries delve for dreams. But not all wait for their victims to fall asleep.
trans-unit.target: 所有仙灵都会探索幻梦。 但不是每个都愿等到苦主睡着。

trans-unit.source: Torture
trans-unit.target: 折磨

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\n{1}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 {1}{B}：在受此结界的生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: What the vigor of life builds up, agony tears down again.
trans-unit.target: 生命活力所成就的，会被苦痛再度毁灭。

trans-unit.source: Wound Reflection
trans-unit.target: 伤痛映象

trans-unit.resname: SHM·81 | Wound Reflection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the end of each turn, each opponent loses life equal to the life he or she lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)
trans-unit.target: 在每个回合结束时，每位对手各失去若干生命，其数量等同于他在本回合所失去的生命数量。 （伤害会导致失去生命。）

trans-unit.source: The mission of the Nighthearth, Illulia's cult of murderous cinders, is to intensify every pain suffered in Shadowmoor.
trans-unit.target: 伊璐里领导的烬身教派名为夜炉，其宗旨是让暗影荒原上的一切苦痛更加剧烈。

trans-unit.source: Blistering Dieflyn
trans-unit.target: 迅猛戴夫林

trans-unit.resname: SHM·82 | Blistering Dieflyn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{BR}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {B/R}：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Any kithkin smith would love to catch a dieflyn for her kiln, relieving her of ever having to gather fuel again.
trans-unit.target: 每位洁英铁匠都想抓个戴夫林放到炉子里，这样就不用再去找燃油了。

trans-unit.source: Bloodmark Mentor
trans-unit.target: 血戳明师

trans-unit.resname: SHM·83 | Bloodmark Mentor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Red creatures you control have first strike.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的红色生物具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.source: Boggarts divide the world into two categories: things you can eat, and things you have to chase down and pummel before you can eat.
trans-unit.target: 波尬将举世事物分成两类：能吃的，以及得先追逐、拳打后才能吃的。

trans-unit.source: Bloodshed Fever
trans-unit.target: 浴血狂热

trans-unit.resname: SHM·84 | Bloodshed Fever | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature attacks each turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 受此结界的生物每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.source: Cinder mages enjoy seeing their victims in the throes of bloodlust—and seeing the regret that inevitably follows.
trans-unit.target: 烬身法师喜欢看苦主因嗜血欲望而痛苦挣扎～以及观察他们因注定后果而后悔的样子。

trans-unit.source: Boggart Arsonists
trans-unit.target: 纵火波尬

trans-unit.resname: SHM·85 | Boggart Arsonists | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Plainswalk\n{2}{R}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target Scarecrow or Plains.
trans-unit.target: 平原行者 {2}{R}，牺牲CARDNAME：消灭目标稻草人或平原。

trans-unit.source: The Aurora transformed Nibb and Gyik from mischief-makers into feral marauders. They still don't know much about tool safety.
trans-unit.target: 极光将尼布与吉可从捣蛋鬼转化为野蛮劫掠者。 而他们对工具安全依旧没什么概念。

trans-unit.source: Burn Trail
trans-unit.target: 焚迹

trans-unit.resname: SHM·86 | Burn Trail | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target creature or player.\nConspire (As you play this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。 协力 （于你使用此咒语时，你可以横置两个由你操控、且与此咒语有共通颜色的未横置生物。 当你如此作，则复制此咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.source: Cragganwick Cremator
trans-unit.target: 喀干伟火葬师

trans-unit.resname: SHM·87 | Cragganwick Cremator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, discard a card at random. If you discard a creature card this way, CARDNAME deals damage equal to that card's power to target player.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，随机弃一张牌。 如果你以此法弃掉一张生物牌，则CARDNAME对目标牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于该牌的力量。

trans-unit.source: Each night that his bowl fills, a village mourns.
trans-unit.target: 在他享受丰盛晚餐时，会有个村子整夜哀悼。

trans-unit.source: Crimson Wisps
trans-unit.target: 深红鬼火

trans-unit.resname: SHM·88 | Crimson Wisps | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature becomes red and gains haste until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物成为红色且具有敏捷异能。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The whispers are incomprehensible, yet cinders always hear a message of urgency.
trans-unit.target: 在这难解细语中，烬身依旧能听到紧急讯息。

trans-unit.source: Deep-Slumber Titan
trans-unit.target: 沉眠泰坦

trans-unit.resname: SHM·89 | Deep-Slumber Titan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\nCARDNAME doesn't untap during your untap step.\nWhenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, untap it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 CARDNAME于你的重置步骤中不能重置。 每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，将它重置。

trans-unit.source: Do not disturb.
trans-unit.target: 切勿打扰。

trans-unit.source: Elemental Mastery
trans-unit.target: 精研元素

trans-unit.resname: SHM·90 | Elemental Mastery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has "{T}: Put X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste into play, where X is this creature's power. Remove them from the game at end of turn."
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 受此结界的生物具有「{T}：将X个1/1红色，具敏捷异能的元素衍生物放置进场，X为此生物的力量。 在回合结束时将它们移出对战。」

trans-unit.source: Ember Gale
trans-unit.target: 烬风

trans-unit.resname: SHM·91 | Ember Gale | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures target player controls can't block this turn. CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each white and/or blue creature that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 由目标牌手操控的生物本回合不能进行阻挡。 CARDNAME对由该牌手操控的每个白色和／或蓝色生物各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Terrible wind. It whipped sparks into our skin, then stoked them even hotter!"\n—Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain
trans-unit.target: 「好恐怖的风势。 它把皮肤鞭打得有如火灼，还让势头越来越强。」 ～八连屯卫队长伯文

trans-unit.source: Flame Javelin
trans-unit.target: 火焰标枪

trans-unit.resname: SHM·92 | Flame Javelin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({2\nR} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)\nCARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: （能用任意两点法术力或是{R}来支付{2/R}。 此牌的总法术力费用为6。） CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Gyara Spearhurler would have been renowned for her deadly accuracy, if it weren't for her deadly accuracy.
trans-unit.target: 掷枪手嘉拉总能精确命中，让她精确夺命的名号难以传扬开来。

trans-unit.source: Furystoke Giant
trans-unit.target: 怒炉巨人

trans-unit.resname: SHM·93 | Furystoke Giant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, other creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals 2 damage to target creature or player" until end of turn.\nPersist (When this creature is put into a graveyard from play, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to play under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，由你操控的其他生物获得「{T}：此生物对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害」直到回合结束。 留存 （当此生物从场上置入坟墓场时，若其上没有-1/-1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回场上，且其上有一个-1/-1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: SHM·94 | Horde of Boggarts | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Horde of Boggarts
trans-unit.target: 波尬大军

trans-unit.resname: SHM·94 | Horde of Boggarts | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of red permanents you control.\nCARDNAME can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量及防御力各等同于由你操控的红色永久物之数量。 CARDNAME只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·94 | Horde of Boggarts | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Strategies don't come easily to the boggarts' feral minds, but full-on assault hasn't failed them yet.
trans-unit.target: 波尬的野蛮心智不容易想到什么策略，但全面攻击从来都足以奏效。

trans-unit.source: Inescapable Brute
trans-unit.target: 定劫蛮汉

trans-unit.resname: SHM·95 | Inescapable Brute | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)\nCARDNAME must be blocked if able.
trans-unit.target: 干枯 （此来源会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。） 若能阻挡CARDNAME，则必须阻挡之。

trans-unit.source: If you think you made it past him alive, he's just teasing you.
trans-unit.target: 如果你自认已逃过一劫，那是因为他只在玩弄你。

trans-unit.source: Intimidator Initiate
trans-unit.target: 威吓学徒

trans-unit.resname: SHM·96 | Intimidator Initiate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手使用红色咒语时，你可以支付{1}。 若你如此作，则目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Don't stand in his way, for his way is full of pointy things and fire.
trans-unit.target: 别挡他的路，那上面遍布尖刺与火焰。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·97 | Jaws of Stone | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jaws of Stone
trans-unit.target: 岩石夹击

trans-unit.resname: SHM·97 | Jaws of Stone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you play CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意数量的目标生物和／或牌手造成共X点伤害，你可以任意分配；X为你使用CARDNAME时所操控之山脉的数量。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·97 | Jaws of Stone | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.
trans-unit.target: 巨人发现自己山中家园被侵扰时，他们有很多种解决方法。

trans-unit.source: Knollspine Dragon
trans-unit.target: 丘脊巨龙

trans-unit.resname: SHM·98 | Knollspine Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, you may discard your hand and draw cards equal to the damage dealt to target opponent this turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以弃掉你的手牌并抓若干牌，其数量等同于目标对手本回合受过的伤害数量。

trans-unit.source: It woke to find a vast world in need of a master.
trans-unit.target: 他张眼便见到个广大而欠缺主宰的世界。

trans-unit.source: Knollspine Invocation
trans-unit.target: 丘脊祝愿

trans-unit.resname: SHM·99 | Knollspine Invocation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {X}, Discard a card with converted mana cost X: CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: {X}，弃掉一张总法术力费用为X的牌：CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Witches tempted by the power of flame gathered to study in the ruins of Spinerock Knoll.
trans-unit.target: 追逐火焰力量的法师聚众研究脊石圆丘的遗迹。

trans-unit.source: Mudbrawler Cohort
trans-unit.target: 泥闹助拳人

trans-unit.resname: SHM·100 | Mudbrawler Cohort | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nCARDNAME gets +1/+1 as long as you control another red creature.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 只要你操控其他红色生物，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: Before a raid, the members of Wort's gang egg each other on with tales of their hunger and what they'll do to sate it, each outdoing the last.
trans-unit.target: 麦汁这帮在打劫之前会分别讲述故事，用自己的渴求与满足之道来互相怂恿，并且一个讲得比一个夸张。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·101 | Power of Fire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Power of Fire
trans-unit.target: 火焰之力

trans-unit.resname: SHM·101 | Power of Fire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 受此结界的生物具有「{T}：此生物对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.resname: SHM·101 | Power of Fire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The cinders believe their flame was stolen by one they call the Extinguisher. All who now wield fire draw their desperate wrath.
trans-unit.target: 烬身相信该族的火焰是给称作熄焰者的人所偷走。 所有还挥舞着火光的人都会招致他们盲目的愤怒。

trans-unit.source: Puncture Bolt
trans-unit.target: 穿刺击

trans-unit.resname: SHM·102 | Puncture Bolt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature. Put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成1点伤害。 在该生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Cinder pyromancers measure their success by counting their enemies' smoking holes.
trans-unit.target: 烬身烈焰术士是用敌人身上冒烟洞孔的数量来论高下。

trans-unit.source: Pyre Charger
trans-unit.target: 葬火冲锋者

trans-unit.resname: SHM·103 | Pyre Charger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\n{R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 {R}：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: His blade was forged over coals of moaning treefolk, curved at the optimum angle for severing heads, and heated to volcanic temperatures by his touch.
trans-unit.target: 其刀锋是以哀嚎树妖所制的煤炭加热铸造，弯曲至最大限度好割下头颅，并在他的碰触之下提升至火山般的高热。

trans-unit.source: Rage Reflection
trans-unit.target: 愤怒映象

trans-unit.resname: SHM·104 | Rage Reflection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have double strike.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有连击异能。

trans-unit.source: Vengeance is a dish best served twice.
trans-unit.target: 复仇这道菜最适合上两次。

trans-unit.source: Rustrazor Butcher
trans-unit.target: 锈刃屠夫

trans-unit.resname: SHM·105 | Rustrazor Butcher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nWither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
trans-unit.target: 先攻 干枯 （此来源会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: A Bloodwort's blade is salted with blood and peppered with rust, seasoning and slaughtering in a single swipe.
trans-unit.target: 血汁族的刀刃是用血当盐巴、拿锈充胡椒，只消一劈就可收调味与屠宰之效。

trans-unit.source: Slinking Giant
trans-unit.target: 潜行巨人

trans-unit.resname: SHM·106 | Slinking Giant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)\nWhenever CARDNAME blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 干枯 （此来源会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。） 每当CARDNAME阻挡或被阻挡时，它得-3/-0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "I need a better hiding place."
trans-unit.target: 「我得找个更好的藏身处。」

trans-unit.resname: SHM·107 | Smash to Smithereens | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Smash to Smithereens
trans-unit.target: 砸成碎片

trans-unit.resname: SHM·107 | Smash to Smithereens | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact. CARDNAME deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器。 CARDNAME对该神器的操控者造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·107 | Smash to Smithereens | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The giant Tarvik dreamed that trinkets and machines caused all the world's woe. When he awoke from his troubled sleep, he took the name Tarvik Relicsmasher.
trans-unit.target: 巨人塔巍克梦到琐物与机器替世界带来灾祸。 当他自恶梦醒来后，便有了砸器塔巍克的名号。

trans-unit.source: Wild Swing
trans-unit.target: 猛力挥击

trans-unit.resname: SHM·108 | Wild Swing | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose three target nonenchantment permanents. Destroy one of them at random.
trans-unit.target: 选择三个目标非结界的永久物。 随机消灭其中一个。

trans-unit.source: Though the shaman rarely got what she wanted, she was never disappointed in the result.
trans-unit.target: 虽然祭师很少能得到预定的成果，但结果却总不会让她失望。

trans-unit.source: Crabapple Cohort
trans-unit.target: 山楂助拳人

trans-unit.resname: SHM·109 | Crabapple Cohort | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 as long as you control another green creature.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控其他绿色生物，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: Seven wives made seven pies from seven apples, each plucked from its branches. Now bare and bitter, it comes to exact its price: one apple, one bone.
trans-unit.target: 七个老婆用七个苹果作七个派，每个都从这枝干上面拔下来。 它给拔个光秃秃后来索债：每个苹果用一根骨头来换。

trans-unit.source: Devoted Druid
trans-unit.target: 虔诚德鲁伊

trans-unit.resname: SHM·110 | Devoted Druid | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.\nPut a -1/-1 counter on CARDNAME: Untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{G}到你的法术力池中。 在CARDNAME上放置一个-1/-1指示物：重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "Mana lurks in all things, even in the depths of one's own heart."
trans-unit.target: 「魔力存于万物之中，就算在心底深处也一样。」

trans-unit.source: Dramatic Entrance
trans-unit.target: 戏剧性登场

trans-unit.resname: SHM·111 | Dramatic Entrance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may put a green creature card from your hand into play.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将一张绿色生物牌从你手上放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Some things aren't worth waiting for.
trans-unit.target: 有些东西不值得等。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·112 | Drove of Elves | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drove of Elves
trans-unit.target: 地精齐群

trans-unit.resname: SHM·112 | Drove of Elves | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of green permanents you control.\nCARDNAME can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量及防御力各等同于由你操控的绿色永久物之数量。 CARDNAME不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·112 | Drove of Elves | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The light of beauty protects our journeys through darkness."
trans-unit.target: 「美之光芒保佑我们穿越黑暗。」

trans-unit.source: Farhaven Elf
trans-unit.target: 觅境地精

trans-unit.resname: SHM·113 | Farhaven Elf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may search your library for a basic land card and put it into play tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置进场。 若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Verdant bloom does exist. It merely hides for its own safety."
trans-unit.target: 「新绿之花确实存在。 它只是在避难而已。」

trans-unit.source: Flourishing Defenses
trans-unit.target: 茁壮防卫

trans-unit.resname: SHM·114 | Flourishing Defenses | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a -1/-1 counter is placed on a creature, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token into play.
trans-unit.target: 每当在任一生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物时，你可以将一个1/1绿色的地精／战士衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Many horrors take the bait of brave elf volunteers walking alone, only to fall to the blades of rescuers lurking nearby.
trans-unit.target: 许多惊惧邪兽被勇敢的独行地精引上勾，成了一旁躲藏的援兵之刀下亡魂。

trans-unit.source: Foxfire Oak
trans-unit.target: 狐火橡树

trans-unit.resname: SHM·115 | Foxfire Oak | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {RG}{RG}{RG}: CARDNAME gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {R/G}{R/G}{R/G}：CARDNAME得+3/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "The brethren shall blaze with unnatural fire, and the flame shall consume and purify our rage."\n—Treefolk catastrophe myth
trans-unit.target: 「弟兄将绽放超凡火焰，将我们的愤怒吞噬并净化。」 ～树妖末世谭

trans-unit.source: Gleeful Sabotage
trans-unit.target: 欢乐破坏

trans-unit.resname: SHM·116 | Gleeful Sabotage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.\nConspire (As you play this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或结界。 协力 （于你使用此咒语时，你可以横置两个由你操控、且与此咒语有共通颜色的未横置生物。 当你如此作，则复制此咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.source: Gloomwidow
trans-unit.target: 暗寡妇

trans-unit.source: Reach\nCARDNAME can't block creatures without flying.
trans-unit.target: 延势 CARDNAME不能阻挡不具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.source: When gloomwidows mature, they abandon venom in favor of massive webs that span the eaves of cliffs.
trans-unit.target: 当暗寡妇长成后，便不再仰赖毒素，而是编结横跨山崖的广大蛛网。

trans-unit.source: Gloomwidow's Feast
trans-unit.target: 暗寡妇盛宴

trans-unit.resname: SHM·118 | Gloomwidow's Feast | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with flying. If that creature was blue or black, put a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach into play. (It can block creatures with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标具飞行异能的生物。 如果该生物是蓝色或黑色，则将一个1/2绿色，具延势异能的蜘蛛衍生物放置进场。 （它能阻挡 具飞行异能的生物。）

trans-unit.source: Each night, gloomwidows cull fresh prey for their ravenous hatchlings.
trans-unit.target: 暗寡妇每个夜晚都替自己大胃口的孩子挑选新鲜猎物。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·119 | Howl of the Night Pack | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Howl of the Night Pack
trans-unit.target: 夜狼群之吼

trans-unit.resname: SHM·119 | Howl of the Night Pack | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token into play for each Forest you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个树林，便将一个2/2绿色的狼衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·119 | Howl of the Night Pack | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The murderous horrors of Raven's Run are legendary, but even that haunted place goes quiet when the night wolves howl.
trans-unit.target: 生息于黑鸦地的凶猛惊惧兽非常闻名，但当夜狼长嚎，即使此般鬼境也会为之静默。

trans-unit.source: Hungry Spriggan
trans-unit.target: 饥饿斯皮肯

trans-unit.resname: SHM·120 | Hungry Spriggan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它得+3/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: If a spriggan's eyes are larger than its stomach, it has ways to remedy the situation.
trans-unit.target: 如果斯皮肯的眼睛比胃大，才有办法改善处境。

trans-unit.source: Juvenile Gloomwidow
trans-unit.target: 幼年暗寡妇

trans-unit.resname: SHM·121 | Juvenile Gloomwidow | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Reach (This can block creatures with flying.)\nWither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
trans-unit.target: 延势 （它能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。） 干枯 （此来源会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: Gloomwidow venom is particularly virulent during the spider's first years, when it does most of its hunting near the forest floor.
trans-unit.target: 暗寡妇的毒液在初生的那年特别致命，并且多半在树林底层猎食。

trans-unit.source: Mana Reflection
trans-unit.target: 魔力映象

trans-unit.resname: SHM·122 | Mana Reflection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you tap a permanent for mana, it produces twice as much of that mana instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你横置任一永久物来产生法术力，则改为它产生两倍的该类法术力。

trans-unit.source: Despite its darkness, Shadowmoor doesn't want for growth. Legions of creeping things thrive in the shade.
trans-unit.target: 除了黑暗之外，暗影荒原没东西能成长。 数不清的可怕东西在阴影中求生。

trans-unit.source: Mossbridge Troll
trans-unit.target: 苔桥巨魔

trans-unit.resname: SHM·123 | Mossbridge Troll | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME would be destroyed, regenerate it.\nTap any number of untapped creatures you control other than CARDNAME with total power 10 or greater: CARDNAME gets +20/+20 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 如果CARDNAME将被消灭，则重生之。 横置任意数量由你操控、不包括CARDNAME、且力量总和为10或更多的未横置生物：CARDNAME得+20/+20直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Nurturer Initiate
trans-unit.target: 滋养学徒

trans-unit.resname: SHM·124 | Nurturer Initiate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手使用绿色咒语时，你可以支付{1}。 若你如此作，则目标生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The elves alone preserve the few shreds of beauty left. There is no one else who cares.
trans-unit.target: 地精独力保存少数仅剩的美物片段。 他族对此都不感兴趣。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·125 | Presence of Gond | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Presence of Gond
trans-unit.target: 刚德现身

trans-unit.resname: SHM·125 | Presence of Gond | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has "{T}: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token into play."
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 受此结界的生物具有「{T}：将一个1/1绿色的地精／战士衍生物放置进场。」

trans-unit.resname: SHM·125 | Presence of Gond | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."
trans-unit.target: 「刚德，塔德温华域的英雄，在此长眠。 愿他永远领导我们的探索。」

trans-unit.source: Prismatic Omen
trans-unit.target: 五彩预兆

trans-unit.resname: SHM·126 | Prismatic Omen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的地均额外具有所有基本地类别。

trans-unit.source: In times of portent, the land sculpts itself in accordance with the sigils burned on the sky.
trans-unit.target: 在预兆之时，大地将依照天空燃烧的印记形状来型塑自身。

trans-unit.source: Raking Canopy
trans-unit.target: 舞动树冠

trans-unit.resname: SHM·127 | Raking Canopy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature with flying attacks you, CARDNAME deals 4 damage to it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个具飞行异能的生物攻击你时，CARDNAME对它造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Raven's Run has awoken, and ravens will no longer cry in its branches."\n—Roon Ghastbark
trans-unit.target: 「黑鸦地已经苏醒，黑鸦将再也无法于该地枝头上鸣叫。」 ～白皮木伦恩

trans-unit.source: Roughshod Mentor
trans-unit.target: 凶横明师

trans-unit.resname: SHM·128 | Roughshod Mentor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Green creatures you control have trample.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的绿色生物具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: He didn't hear the cries of the treefolk whose branches he snapped or of the elves caught underfoot. He had eyes only for the path ahead.
trans-unit.target: 他听不到树枝被其折断之树妖哀嚎，也听不到脚板下给他踩到的地精惨号。 他眼睛只顾着看前方的路。

trans-unit.source: Spawnwrithe
trans-unit.target: 盘蛇灵

trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, put a token into play that's a copy of CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，将一个衍生物放置进场，此衍生物为CARDNAME之复制。

trans-unit.source: Its victims feel only an itchy, wriggling feeling just under their skin. By then, it's far too late.
trans-unit.target: 受害者只会感到皮下有阵搔痒、蠕动的感觉。 而那时候早已太迟了。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·130 | Toil to Renown | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Toil to Renown
trans-unit.target: 历险孚望

trans-unit.resname: SHM·130 | Toil to Renown | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 1 life for each tapped artifact, creature, and land you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个横置的神器，生物，以及地，便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·130 | Toil to Renown | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The last survivor of her patrol, the warrior returned expecting disappointment and scorn. Instead she found gratitude. "You are alive. That is reason to celebrate."
trans-unit.target: 巡逻队的最后一名生还战士逃了回来，已有给失望的长官痛骂一顿的觉悟。 而迎接她的却是一份感激心意。 「你还活着。 这就足以庆祝了。」

trans-unit.source: Tower Above
trans-unit.target: 巍然屹立

trans-unit.resname: SHM·131 | Tower Above | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({2\nG} can be paid with any two mana or with {G}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)\nUntil end of turn, target creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample, wither, and "When this creature attacks, target creature blocks it this turn if able." (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
trans-unit.target: （能用任意两点法术力或是{G}来支付{2/G}。 此牌的总法术力费用为6。） 直到回合结束，目标生物得+4/+4且获得践踏与干枯异能，以及「当此生物攻击时，目标生物本回合若能阻挡它，则须阻挡之。」 （它会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: Viridescent Wisps
trans-unit.target: 碧绿鬼火

trans-unit.resname: SHM·132 | Viridescent Wisps | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature becomes green and gets +1/+0 until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物成为绿色且得+1/+0。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: In the wisps that night, the once timid boggart saw all the terrible, bloody things he was capable of. And it was glorious.
trans-unit.target: 在那晚的鬼火中，一向胆小的波尬看到了自己能成就的所有恐怖、血腥事迹。 那看起来真是美好。

trans-unit.source: Wildslayer Elves
trans-unit.target: 伏蛮地精

trans-unit.resname: SHM·133 | Wildslayer Elves | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
trans-unit.target: 干枯 （此来源会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: Some elves battled too long in the deep shadow, their swords dipped too often in tainted flesh and poisoned blood.
trans-unit.target: 在深沉黑暗中战斗太久的地精，剑锋滴下的经常是污毒血肉。

trans-unit.source: Witherscale Wurm
trans-unit.target: 凋鳞亚龙

trans-unit.resname: SHM·134 | Witherscale Wurm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature gains wither until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)\nWhenever CARDNAME deals damage to an opponent, remove all -1/-1 counters from it.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME阻挡生物或被生物阻挡时，该生物获得干枯异能直到回合结束。 （它会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。） 每当CARDNAME向对手造成伤害时，移去其上所有的-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Woodfall Primus
trans-unit.target: 摧木督长

trans-unit.resname: SHM·135 | Woodfall Primus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, destroy target noncreature permanent.\nPersist (When this creature is put into a graveyard from play, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to play under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进场时，消灭目标非生物的永久物。 留存 （当此生物从场上置入坟墓场时，若其上没有-1/-1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回场上，且其上有一个-1/-1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Aethertow
trans-unit.target: 乙太拖行

trans-unit.source: Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.\nConspire (As you play this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。 协力 （于你使用此咒语时，你可以横置两个由你操控、且与此咒语有共通颜色的未横置生物。 当你如此作，则复制此咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.source: Augury Adept
trans-unit.target: 卜算专家

trans-unit.resname: SHM·137 | Augury Adept | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，展示你的牌库顶牌，并将该牌置于你手上。 你获得等同于其总法术力费用的生命。

trans-unit.source: Moonstones grant limited foresight but unlimited advantages.
trans-unit.target: 月石提供的预知能力有限，却能带来无限优势。

trans-unit.source: Barrenton Cragtreads
trans-unit.target: 八连屯峭行人

trans-unit.resname: SHM·138 | Barrenton Cragtreads | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by red creatures.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被红色生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Boggarts are easy to get around. Just toss some mutton in another direction. Giants are a little harder. You have to be quick to avoid their steps. Cinders are the difficult ones, but even they have fears to be exploited."
trans-unit.target: 「波尬很容易甩开； 只要往其他方向扔块羊肉即可。 巨人就难一点； 必须够快闪开他们的脚踩。 烬身则最难，但就算他们也有可资利用的恐惧。」

trans-unit.resname: SHM·139 | Curse of Chains | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curse of Chains
trans-unit.target: 锁链诅咒

trans-unit.resname: SHM·139 | Curse of Chains | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nAt the beginning of each upkeep, tap enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 在每个维持开始时，横置受此结界的生物。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·139 | Curse of Chains | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The giant's real punishment was the fleeting moment when he was allowed to stand before being dragged down to his knees again.
trans-unit.target: 当巨人从站姿再度给强拉跪地前的那段短暂时光，才是对他真正的惩罚。

trans-unit.source: Enchanted Evening
trans-unit.target: 迷醉傍晚

trans-unit.resname: SHM·140 | Enchanted Evening | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All permanents are enchantments in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: 所有永久物额外具有结界此类别。

trans-unit.source: In the reflection, she saw the rough shell of the world sloughing away, revealing the truth shining underneath.
trans-unit.target: 她在映影中看到世界的粗壳蜕落，展现出内部的真实光辉。

trans-unit.source: Glamer Spinners
trans-unit.target: 幻法旋舞师

trans-unit.resname: SHM·141 | Glamer Spinners | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, attach all Auras enchanting target permanent to another permanent with the same controller.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，将结附在目标永久物上的所有灵气结附到另一个永久物上，且两个永久物的操控者须相同。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·142 | Godhead of Awe | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Godhead of Awe
trans-unit.target: 敬畏神性

trans-unit.source: "What she saw crawling upon this world repulsed her. Yet she could not tear her gaze away."\n—*The Seer's Parables*
trans-unit.target: 「充斥这世上的东西令她反感。 但她又没法子不看。」 ～《预言师寓言》

trans-unit.source: Each other creature becomes a copy of target nonlegendary creature until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他生物成为目标非传奇生物的复制直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Those who are different are untrustworthy, unpredictable. Put your safety in the hands of your own kind."\n—Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain
trans-unit.target: 「那些跟我们不一样的家伙既不可靠又难以捉摸。 把安全交在自己人手上吧。」 ～八连屯卫队长伯文

trans-unit.source: Olka collected the evening mist for years, studying its secrets. Once she learned its essence, she could vanish with a thought.
trans-unit.target: 欧卡收集暮雾数年，好研究其间秘密。 而当她通晓精华后，即可在转念间消失身形。

trans-unit.target: 「那是片极大极广的滑翔翅膀，完全无声。 它突然地出现，挡住我们望向洁英要塞的视线。」 ～美洛割喉手格兰许

trans-unit.source: Stripped of his sight, he was free to see only the ideal.

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nAs long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Whenever it deals damage, its controller gains that much life.)\nAs long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and is unblockable.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 只要受此结界的生物是白色，它便得+1/+1且具有系命异能。 （每当它造成伤害时，其操控者获得等量的生命。） 只要受此结界的生物是蓝色，它便得+1/+1且不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·151 | Swans of Bryn Argoll | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Any being that harms them quickly learns its lesson.

trans-unit.target: 「烬身在苦痛中找到力量，地精则在美丽中寻求。 如果你让地精受苦，他就会衰弱。 若让烬身变得美丽，又会发生什么事？」 ～弄蛭人胡噶许

trans-unit.source: No one can navigate the dank maze of Shadowmoor's rivers better than the cruel and covetous merrows. They use the currents to steal—and to steal away.
trans-unit.target: 只有残酷又贪婪的美洛，才能在暗影荒原河流所形成的潮湿迷阵间为你领航。 他们利用潮流来偷窃与匿踪。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 {X}{U/B}：选择一种颜色。 目标对手将其牌库顶的X张牌移出对战。 每以此法将一张该颜色的牌移出对战，便将一个1/1，蓝黑双色，且具飞行异能的仙灵／浪客衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Some words are too important to trust to something as fragile as memory.

trans-unit.resname: SHM·176 | Sygg, River Cutthroat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's not a matter of deserving. It's a matter of strength. The power to hold versus the power to take."
trans-unit.target: 「这不是有无资格的问题， 而是力量的问题。 这是保有之力与夺取之力的对决。」

trans-unit.source: Torpor Dust
trans-unit.target: 迟钝粉尘

trans-unit.resname: SHM·177 | Torpor Dust | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nEnchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -3/-0.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 生物结界 受此结界的生物得-3/-0。

trans-unit.source: "Some folk these days are too restless to dream the dreams we need. We need to teach them to stop and catch their breath."
trans-unit.target: 「这阵子有些人过于勤奋，没法子梦到我们需要的眠梦。 得教他们该停下来喘口气才行。」

trans-unit.source: Wanderbrine Rootcutters
trans-unit.target: 漫涩河刈根客

trans-unit.resname: SHM·178 | Wanderbrine Rootcutters | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by green creatures.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被绿色生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Most dirtwalkers only know of the vicious merrows that dwell in the shallows. They can't begin to fathom the wickedness that skulks in the Dark Meanders.
trans-unit.target: 大多数陆行者只见过居住在浅滩的凶猛美洛。 而他们根本还比不上藏在暗曲礁的恶毒份子。

trans-unit.source: Wasp Lancer
trans-unit.target: 蜂矛兵

trans-unit.resname: SHM·179 | Wasp Lancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "I doubt that faeries understand how short their lives are, compared to the rest of us. If they did, would they so readily charge into battle, heedless of the danger before them?"\n—Awylla, elvish safewright
trans-unit.target: 「自己的一生跟其他族比起来有多短，我怀疑仙灵根本不懂。 如果他们真懂了，还会这样欣然投入战场、毫不在意眼前危险吗？」 ～地精美境卫艾薇拉

trans-unit.source: Ashenmoor Gouger
trans-unit.target: 灰原凿手

trans-unit.resname: SHM·180 | Ashenmoor Gouger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: After his hands had crumbled away, leaving only wickedly sharp points, he decided his only purpose was war.
trans-unit.target: 在双手崩坏成奇型尖刺后，他决定把精力全部投入战争。

trans-unit.source: Ashenmoor Liege
trans-unit.target: 灰原王侯

trans-unit.resname: SHM·181 | Ashenmoor Liege | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other black creatures you control get +1/+1.\nOther red creatures you control get +1/+1.\nWhenever CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, that player loses 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他黑色生物得+1/+1。 由你操控的其他红色生物得+1/+1。 每当CARDNAME成为由对手操控的咒语或异能之目标时，该牌手失去4点生命。

trans-unit.source: Cinders carry an ancestral grudge that makes them slow to trust and quick to retaliate.
trans-unit.target: 烬身一族背负的长年怀恨，让他们不轻信又爱报复。

trans-unit.source: Cultbrand Cinder
trans-unit.target: 烙记烬身

trans-unit.resname: SHM·182 | Cultbrand Cinder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，在目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Your seared flesh will be the first step in your journey to dark enlightenment."
trans-unit.target: 「焦灼的肉体是你黑暗启蒙之旅的第一步。」

trans-unit.resname: SHM·183 | Demigod of Revenge | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 复仇半神

trans-unit.resname: SHM·183 | Demigod of Revenge | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 飞行，敏捷 当你使用CARDNAME时，将你坟墓场中所有名称为CARDNAME的牌返回场上。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·183 | Demigod of Revenge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "His laugh, a bellowing, deathly din, slices through the heavens, making them bleed."\n—*The Seer's Parables*
trans-unit.target: 「他笑声如狂嚎般喧嚣，从天际横扫而过，留下长长血痕。」 ～《预言师寓言》

trans-unit.resname: SHM·184 | Din of the Fireherd | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 炎骏喧闹

trans-unit.source: Put a 5/5 black and red Elemental creature token into play. Target opponent sacrifices a creature for each black creature you control, then sacrifices a land for each red creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 将一个5/5，黑红双色的元素衍生物放置进场。 你每操控一个黑色生物，目标对手便牺牲一个生物，然后你每操控一个红色生物，该对手便牺牲一个地。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·184 | Din of the Fireherd | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Vengeance in stampede form.
trans-unit.target: 复仇的狂奔形式。

trans-unit.source: Emberstrike Duo
trans-unit.target: 烬击搭档

trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a black spell, CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn.\nWhenever you play a red spell, CARDNAME gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用一个黑色咒语时，CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。 每当你使用一个红色咒语时，CARDNAME获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Everlasting Torment
trans-unit.target: 无穷折磨

trans-unit.resname: SHM·186 | Everlasting Torment | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Players can't gain life.\nDamage can't be prevented.\nAll damage is dealt as though its source had wither. (A source with wither deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
trans-unit.target: 牌手不能获得生命。 伤害不能被防止。 造成所有伤害时，其来源都视同具有干枯异能。 （具有干枯异能的来源会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: When night fell, the plane itself was scarred.
trans-unit.target: 当夜晚降临，时空已遍布伤疤。

trans-unit.target: 半神之拳

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nAs long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +1/+1 and has wither. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)\nAs long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 只要受此结界的生物是黑色，它便得+1/+1且具有干枯异能。 （它会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。） 只要受此结界的生物是红色，它便得+1/+1且具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.source: Fulminator Mage
trans-unit.target: 雷鸣法师

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target nonbasic land.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：消灭目标非基本地。

trans-unit.source: "Unsafe Terrain Ahead—Turn Back"\n—Sign near the former location of Pyrtagh Cairn
trans-unit.target: 「前方乃危险地带～请折返」 ～派塔石冢旧址附近的警示

trans-unit.source: Grief Tyrant
trans-unit.target: 传悲暴君

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进场时上面有四个-1/-1指示物。 当CARDNAME从场上置入坟墓场时，其上每有一个-1/-1指示物，就在目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.target: 库拉斯骑士

trans-unit.target: 飞行 干枯 （此来源会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。） 由对手操控、且上面有指示物的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Mounted cinders circle the blasted peak at Kulrath, hunting the Extinguisher.
trans-unit.target: 烬身乘座骑在库拉斯毁坏的山峰附近打转，想要追猎熄焰者。

trans-unit.target: 魔铸烬身

trans-unit.target: {1}：加{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。 此异能每回合中最多只能使用三次。

trans-unit.source: Cinder mystics set traps for sluaghs and other spirits of flame, seeking to extract the secrets of the fire their own hearts have lost.
trans-unit.target: 烬身秘教徒设陷阱捕猎恶灵与其他火焰精怪，以设法解答他们已失去的心灵火焰秘密。

trans-unit.source: Murderous Redcap
trans-unit.target: 夺魂红帽客

trans-unit.resname: SHM·192 | Murderous Redcap | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.\nPersist (When this creature is put into a graveyard from play, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to play under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，它对目标生物或牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于其力量。 留存 （当此生物从场上置入坟墓场时，若其上没有-1/-1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回场上，且其上有一个-1/-1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: SHM·193 | Poison the Well | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 井底下毒

trans-unit.source: Destroy target land. CARDNAME deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标地。 CARDNAME对该地的操控者造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·193 | Poison the Well | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Wells that provide clean, unhaunted water are rare enough to be worth building an entire town around.
trans-unit.target: 还能提供清净无污染之水的井十分稀有，甚至值得在它周围建立一整座村镇。

trans-unit.source: Scar
trans-unit.target: 划疤

trans-unit.source: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 在目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "What is a scar? A sign of courage in the face of danger? A mere trick of flesh? Or a constant reminder of agonizing pain, and the follies of war."\n—Illulia of Nighthearth
trans-unit.target: 「疤痕是什么？ 面临刀尖时的勇气标志？ 仅只是肉体的装饰？ 或者是悲苦伤痛的备忘录，纪录战争的愚行？」 ～夜炉的伊璐里

trans-unit.source: Sootstoke Kindler
trans-unit.target: 燎烬师

trans-unit.source: Haste\n{T}: Target black or red creature gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 {T}：目标黑色或红色生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Nothing warms my heart better than a spirit kindled with rage."
trans-unit.target: 「被愤怒点燃的灵魂最能温暖我的心。」

trans-unit.source: Sootwalkers
trans-unit.target: 煤烟行者

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by white creatures.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被白色生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Why allow the fires of others to burn, when ours do not? Why leave them content, while we suffer? If there is to be misery, let it be borne by all."
trans-unit.target: 「既然我们无火可燃，为何要让其他人能烧？ 我们处境悲惨，为何要让其他人安逸？ 既然世间有痛苦，就该让所有人分担。」

trans-unit.source: Spiteflame Witch
trans-unit.target: 怨火法术师

trans-unit.resname: SHM·197 | Spiteflame Witch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}{R}: Each player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {B}{R}：每位牌手各失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Cinder beliefs revolve around the Path of Sorrow, a spiritual descent into oblivion. They don't mind taking others on their journey down.
trans-unit.target: 烬身的信念建立在伤痛之道上面，也就是让精神沉沦入空无的过程。 他们并不介意带人同行。

trans-unit.source: Spiteful Visions
trans-unit.target: 怨毒预视

trans-unit.resname: SHM·198 | Spiteful Visions | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws a card.\nWhenever a player draws a card, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that player.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，该牌手抓一张牌。 每当任一牌手抓一张牌时，CARDNAME对该牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Knowledge brings the sting of disillusionment, but the pain teaches perspective.
trans-unit.target: 知识带来醒悟之痛楚，但这苦痛让人开拓视野。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·199 | Torrent of Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Torrent of Souls
trans-unit.target: 灵魂奔流

trans-unit.resname: SHM·199 | Torrent of Souls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to play if {B} was spent to play CARDNAME. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to play CARDNAME. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)
trans-unit.target: 如果使用CARDNAME时支付了{B}，则将至多一张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回场上。 如果使用CARDNAME时支付了{R}，则直到回合结束，由目标牌手操控的生物得+2/+0且获得敏捷异能。 （如果支付了{B}{R}，则两者都作。）

trans-unit.source: Traitor's Roar
trans-unit.target: 叛徒之吼

trans-unit.resname: SHM·200 | Traitor's Roar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Tap target untapped creature. It deals damage equal to its power to its controller.\nConspire (As you play this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
trans-unit.target: 横置目标未横置的生物。 它对其操控者造成等同于其力量的伤害。 协力 （于你使用此咒语时，你可以横置两个由你操控、且与此咒语有共通颜色的未横置生物。 当你如此作，则复制此咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.source: Tyrannize
trans-unit.target: 欺压

trans-unit.source: Target player discards his or her hand unless he or she pays 7 life.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标牌手支付7点生命，否则他弃掉其手牌。

trans-unit.source: "I can stab you where it hurts, or where you will feel absolutely nothing."\n—Illulia of Nighthearth
trans-unit.target: 「我可以刺在让你痛苦的地方，或是让你毫无感觉的地方。」 ～夜炉的伊璐里

trans-unit.source: Boartusk Liege
trans-unit.target: 猪刺王侯

trans-unit.source: Trample\nOther red creatures you control get +1/+1.\nOther green creatures you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 由你操控的其他红色生物得+1/+1。 由你操控的其他绿色生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: The boar leads its rider to victory in battle, but it doesn't know how close it is to becoming the victory feast.
trans-unit.target: 猪座骑在战场将背上骑士带向胜利，却不知道自己随时会变成庆功宴大餐。

trans-unit.source: Boggart Ram-Gang
trans-unit.target: 波尬攻城组

trans-unit.resname: SHM·203 | Boggart Ram-Gang | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nWither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 干枯 （此来源会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: "We're going to need a bigger gate."\n—Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain
trans-unit.target: 「我们得要有个更大的门。」 ～八连屯卫队长伯文

trans-unit.resname: SHM·204 | Deus of Calamity | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 苦难神明

trans-unit.resname: SHM·204 | Deus of Calamity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever CARDNAME deals 6 or more damage to an opponent, destroy target land that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当CARDNAME向对手造成6点或更多伤害时，消灭目标由该牌手操控的地。

trans-unit.resname: SHM·204 | Deus of Calamity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "He bears the marks of ages upon his skin, memories of dreams long dead and best left buried."\n—*The Seer's Parables*
trans-unit.target: 「他身上遍布岁月痕迹，这些破灭梦想的回忆都不宜想起。」 ～《预言师寓言》

trans-unit.source: Firespout
trans-unit.target: 火龙卷

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each creature without flying if {R} was spent to play CARDNAME and 3 damage to each creature with flying if {G} was spent to play it. (Do both if {R}{G} was spent.)
trans-unit.target: 如果使用CARDNAME时支付了{R}，则CARDNAME对每个不具飞行异能的生物各造成3点伤害；如果使用它时支付了{G}，则它对每个具飞行异能的生物各造成3点伤害。 （如果支付了{R}{G}，则两者都作。）

trans-unit.source: Fossil Find
trans-unit.target: 寻找化石

trans-unit.source: Return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand, then reorder your graveyard as you choose.
trans-unit.target: 随机将一张牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上，然后你以任意顺序来排列你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "Some secrets want to be revealed. They burst through the soil of their own accord."\n—Dindun of Kulrath Mine
trans-unit.target: 「有些秘密想要被揭露。 它们是自愿从土壤冒出来的。」 ～库拉斯矿脉的丁顿

trans-unit.source: Giantbaiting
trans-unit.target: 饵诱巨人

trans-unit.source: Put a 4/4 red and green Giant Warrior creature token with haste into play. Remove it from the game at end of turn.\nConspire (As you play this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)
trans-unit.target: 将一个4/4，红绿双色，具敏捷异能的巨人／战士衍生物放置进场。 在回合结束时将它移出对战。 协力 （于你使用此咒语时，你可以横置两个由你操控、且与此咒语有共通颜色的未横置生物。 当你如此作，则复制此咒语。）

trans-unit.source: Guttural Response
trans-unit.target: 喉音回应

trans-unit.resname: SHM·208 | Guttural Response | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target blue instant spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标蓝色瞬间咒语。

trans-unit.source: Wort had a raiding-bellow that could shatter steel, melt auras, and slice countermagic in half.
trans-unit.target: 麦汁的袭击战吼可以粉碎精钢，融解灵气，斩断反击法术。

trans-unit.source: Impromptu Raid
trans-unit.target: 随兴掠夺

trans-unit.resname: SHM·209 | Impromptu Raid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{RG}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it isn't a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, put that card into play. That creature has haste. Sacrifice it at end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {2}{R/G}：展示你的牌库顶牌。 若该牌不是生物牌，则将它置入你的坟墓场。若是生物牌，则将该牌放置进场。 该生物具有敏捷异能。 在回合结束时将之牺牲。

trans-unit.source: For the Scuzzback gang, it's always "raid o'clock."
trans-unit.target: 对杂背帮来说，天天都是打劫天。

trans-unit.source: Loamdragger Giant
trans-unit.target: 曳土巨人

trans-unit.source: Giants sleep soundly and long, sometimes for long enough that a crust of earth and moss grows over them. But inevitably something disturbs their slumber, and they wake unhappy.
trans-unit.target: 巨人睡得又熟又长，甚至会到身上覆满泥土、青苔遍布的程度。 但终究会有人打扰他们的安眠，让他们不高兴地醒来。

trans-unit.source: Manamorphose
trans-unit.target: 魔力塑型

trans-unit.source: Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 加两点法术力到你的法术力池中，其颜色组合由你选择。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: For a moment, objects of pure mana glimmered in the wonderstruck boggart's hands. In the next moment, they were in his mouth, as he chewed contentedly.
trans-unit.target: 纯净法术力的块体曾在惊奇不已的波尬手上发光。 而在下一刻，波尬已满足地嚼着它。

trans-unit.source: It scours the hills for living matter, savoring even the tang of poisonous fungi.
trans-unit.target: 它在山丘上搜索活物，连毒蕈的气味都不放过。

trans-unit.source: To reach the ravine of the Wanderbrine River, they were told to take the shortcut "through the mountains." They took the directions literally.

trans-unit.target: 罗欣每晚都絮叨着某个已逝的阳光充盈世界，而每字每句都只给当成疯女人的胡言乱语。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{UB}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{B}, or {B}{B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {U/B}，{T}：加{U}{U}，{U}{B}，或{B}{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Without the care of the tideshapers, the Lanes lie neglected. Some have flooded entire towns; others dried to cracked mud.
trans-unit.target: 渠道没有了塑潮师的维护，就此弃置。 有些将整个村镇淹没；其他的则干涸成龟裂的泥巴。

trans-unit.source: Wooded Bastion
trans-unit.target: 林木堡垒

trans-unit.resname: SHM·281 | Wooded Bastion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{RW}, {T}: Add {G}{G}, {G}{W}, or {W}{W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {G/W}，{T}：加{G}{G}，{G}{W}，或{W}{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The elves of Wilt-Leaf Wood continually expand the palisade surrounding the sanctuary. They hope to one day enclose the entire forest within its walls.
trans-unit.target: 枯叶林地精继续扩建围护避难所的栅栏。 他们希望有一天能将整座树林都用墙包起来。
